TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ForeignKeyReferenceAlreadyHasValueException extends System.InvalidOperationException

summary.span: Represents errors that occur when an attempt is made to change a foreign key when the entity is already loaded.

span.span: Represents errors that occur when an attempt is made to change a foreign key when the entity is already loaded.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此建構函式會將新執行個體的 屬性初始化為系統提供的錯誤說明訊息，例如 "DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply"。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply". 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`.`null`.| ||當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。The localized error message string.|

param.name: message
param.span: The message that describes the exception.

span.span: The message that describes the exception.

param.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

param.name: message
param.span: The message that describes the exception.

span.span: The message that describes the exception.

param.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

param.name: innerException
param.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: If the innerException parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`.`null`.| ||`message` 中指定的錯誤訊息字串。The error message string specified in `message`.|
